name: Introduction to Programming
description: A beginner-friendly course that introduces the fundamentals of programming using Python. Ideal for those new to coding.

name: Advanced Web Development
description: An in-depth course covering advanced topics in web development, including React, Node.js, and database integration.

name: Data Science with R
description: Learn data analysis and visualization techniques using R. This course covers data manipulation, statistical analysis, and reporting.

name: Machine Learning Basics
description: Get started with machine learning by understanding the core concepts and algorithms. This course covers supervised and unsupervised learning methods.

name: UX/UI Design
description: A comprehensive course on user experience and user interface design. Learn how to create intuitive and aesthetically pleasing designs.
